channel.title: AutoRestarter by Fellixombc
channel.description:
AutoRestarter by Fellixombc. [i]made in C#[/i]
[url=http://virusscan.jotti.org/en/scanresult/de069d3bc5a3603b0da5d0500e7adbbc7a998a0a]Virus Scan[/url]
[b]Server base tested on:[/b] [i]Back To Basics[/i]
[b]Directions:[/b] [i]Put AutoRestarter.exe in your server directory[/i] [i]Make sure you have a run.bat file [b]in the same directory as AutoRestarter.exe[/b] or it won't work![/i]
[b]Features:[/b] -Restarts at custom time (in minutes) -Restarts perfectly -Way better the Voule's auto restarter
[b]Coming soon:[/b] -Exits batches for you
Pictures: [img]http://img20.imageshack.us/img20/5435/autorestarter.png[/img]
Download: Version 1: (sizing bug) Mirror 1: http://www.megaupload.com/?d=KXRQ01FY Mirror 2: http://uppit.com/v/5zxwlbp9
Version 2: Mirror 1: http://www.megaupload.com/?d=21LGDJAE
Credits: Fellixombc, Lin (improved [b]one[/b] of my methods)

item.dc:creator: @twinky12341 twinky12341

i’m sorry but this one kinda fails maybe you should look into making a better version of it soon?

Read full topic

item.title: AutoRestarter by Fellixombc
item.dc:creator: @lost_it lost it
item.description:
@lost_it wrote:

hey how do i like run it… i did run it and i put the time when i click start it says cannot find run.bat =/ i dont know how to put run.bat into it? help me please! heres my msn k.h.a_Salem@hotmail.com or replay here please

Read full topic

item.title: AutoRestarter by Fellixombc
item.dc:creator: @fellixombc fellixombc
item.description:
@fellixombc wrote:

[quote=“ddsowns, post:16, topic:286772”][quote author=fellixombc link=topic=379244.msg2852903#msg2852903 date=1246649255]

Looks great! Mind if I can see the source code? PM me if I’m allowed :).

No, just because that would start spoon feeding, etc.

If I were you, download Visual Studio 2008. C#.

And google “how to kill a certain process C#”

and learn from there.
[/quote]
I wasn’t really going to make anything out of it, just teach myself a bit of C# because I know none.[/quote]
Google was made for a reason.[quote=“TabbyKiller, post:17, topic:286772”][quote author=noobofiyer link=topic=379244.msg2852292#msg2852292 date=1246605583]
Thx mate i gonna use it but

1 Question;

IF it restarts u need to turn ur server online at ur own or it goes Automaticly
[/quote]
It automatically does it, it doesn’t shut it down but just resets the Command Promt.[/quote]
Yeah, I will eventually just have it kill the bat.

Read full topic

item.title: AutoRestarter by Fellixombc
item.dc:creator: @fellixombc fellixombc
item.description:
@fellixombc wrote:

[quote=“Lin, post:6, topic:286772”]Improved one of your methods my ass If it weren’t for me, you wouldn’t even have it starting up the batch file xD

And this isn’t better than Voule’s. Mainly because it kills the first cmd.exe and java.exe it finds. Therefore, it fails. Now if you did it like I said to do it, it would’ve worked great.[/quote]
No, killing the cmd.exe doesn’t do anything, I already tried it manually. And voules can’t set a custom time

And for killing java.exe, I already had that method, but it killed all, but, you made it so it only killed one.

And Voule’s kills all java.exe.

Btw, I did do what you told me to do, except for the batch exiter, get the process ID and kill etc.

Vic_:

What program was this made in? [i.e. Visual c++]

Visual C#

Read full topic

item.description:
@Lin wrote:

Improved one of your methods my ass If it weren’t for me, you wouldn’t even have it starting up the batch file xD

And this isn’t better than Voule’s. Mainly because it kills the first cmd.exe and java.exe it finds. Therefore, it fails. Now if you did it like I said to do it, it would’ve worked great.

Read full topic
